headline: MAA Announces Pricing of Senior Unsecured Notes Offering
summary: Mid-America Apartment Communities, Inc., ("MAA") (NYSE: MAA) today announced that its operating partnership, Mid-America Apartments, L.P. ("MAALP"), priced a $350,000,000 offering of MAALP's 4.950% senior unsecured notes due March 1, 2035 (the "Notes") under its existing shelf registration statement. The Notes were priced at 99.170% of the principal amount. The closing of the offering is expected to occur on December 18, 2024, subject to the satisfaction of customary closing conditions.

headline: ‘Not a bad legacy’: Bolton stepping down at MAA
summary: Brad Hill will take over as CEO, effective April 1, 2025, for the second-largest apartment owner in the county.

headline: Mid-America Announces 3.1% Hike in Dividend: Is It Sustainable?
summary: Mid-America's recent dividend hike of 3.1% is likely to be sustainable, given the company's operational and financial strength.
